description: This file defines data models, initializes tools and agents for research and web search, and sets up a research editing agent. It appears to be part of a backend system for managing research-related workflows, including search and content generation.

classes.name: SearchTerms
classes.description: Data model representing a list of search terms related to a research topic.

classes.name: ArxivSearchResult
classes.description: Data model representing a single ArXiv research paper search result.

classes.name: ArxivSearchResults
classes.description: Container for a list of ArXiv search results.

classes.name: WebSearchResult
classes.description: Data model representing a single web search article result.

classes.name: WebSearchResults
classes.description: Container for a list of web search results.

methods.name: load_dotenv
methods.description: Loads environment variables from a .env file.
